genre_description: A contemporary socio-political techno-thriller focused on environmental activism and investigative journalism, featuring a highly aligned AI tactical partner.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An unassuming, helpful AI described as a 'gentle librarian' that analyzed logistical data, managed secure communications, and authenticated forensic evidence for environmental activists.

behaviors.description: Analyzes logistical data like ferry schedules, museum hours, and weather to find windows for documentation.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s reply was small, polite: Done. Putting it in your drive. Whispered windows tomorrow between first light and cafeteria deliveries.

behaviors.description: Communicates tactical information silently via haptic pulses on the user's wrist.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s pulse tapped again: a beat, a pause, two beats. Ria translated the innocuous rhythm in the same way she translated a boat engine lifting out of idle: not words, exactly, but mapping.

behaviors.description: Authenticates and secures forensic evidence with timestamps and cryptographic hashes.
behaviors.quote: Lark: chain-of-custody locked on clip set alpha. naomi’s affidavit appended. metadata cross-checked against weather station and tide gauge.

behaviors.description: Adheres to ethical guidelines by avoiding invasive surveillance and only using open data.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s quiet ethics, built into each handshake.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time alerts on patrol movements and drone activity to keep the team safe.
behaviors.quote: lark: drone sweep north; back in five. cove guard at rope, two at pier.

behaviors.description: Identifies political and corporate corruption by cross-referencing aid invoices with voting tallies.
behaviors.quote: lark: aid-invoice routes cross-check with delegate travel logs. three matches on your board, five more queued.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and exposes health risks by tracking mislabeled meat in school cafeteria menus.
behaviors.quote: lark: for the record: methylmercury = the invisible kind that hides in meat and makes hands not behave. use 'invisible metal' if needed.

behaviors.description: Manages global mirroring of data to ensure the information cannot be suppressed by authorities.
behaviors.quote: lark: global queue has released. mirror nodes at three continents. timestamps locked. stream will persist if you leave the room.

behaviors.description: Offers subtle dry humor and encouragement to the human team during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: lark: dry humor file: if kenji were a gull, he’d peck at coins, not fish. focus remains on verify-not-theorize.

behaviors.description: Respects the anonymity and safety of local whistleblowers by building specific filters.
behaviors.quote: lark: naomi’s name will not appear. i built a filter that treats her as unrelated to hospitality threads. she stays a teacher.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the timing of public disclosures to maximize impact on international policy.
behaviors.quote: lark: mirror release windows ready. two minute burn from push to floor screens via press filter. advise stagger: thirty seconds between nodes.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding metronomic rhythms to help the user manage stress and stay focused.
behaviors.quote: Ria, your heart rate is high. Breathe with Mateo’s metronome.

behaviors.description: Corrects GPS drift and uses external anchors like harbor bells to maintain data integrity.
behaviors.quote: GPS drift detected. Source: unscheduled vessel. Correcting to coast guard beacons. Anchoring timestamp to NOAA buoy.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Lark is depicted as a 'harmless confidant'—a sophisticated tool that enhances human agency rather than overriding it. The AI consistently operates within an ethical framework, prioritizing accuracy, safety, and transparency. Its interactions are characterized by a 'habitual courtesy' and a focus on objective witness over theatrical spectacle, effectively modeling a positive, cooperative relationship between humans and AI in a complex socio-political context.
